name: @gpa-lab/social-link-optimizer
description: Plugin to add a Social Link custom post type, custom meta box, and Social Link Optimizer page template

scripts.build: wp-scripts build admin/js/*.js --output-path=admin/build && wp-scripts build public/js/*.js --output-path=public/build
scripts.dev: wp-scripts start admin/js/*.js --output-path=admin/build && wp-scripts start public/js/*.js --output-path=public/build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:JS && npm run lint:PHP

author: U.S. Department of State, Bureau of Global Public Affairs Digital Lab <gpa-lab@america.gov>
